title: Reporting is bugged for me.
body:
A lot of the time I keep getting "Diconnected from chat" and then after a game I never get to wait for the end game stats and ALWAYS makes me have to skip it. Recently I had a VERY VERY Toxic Graves player on my team and because I wasn't able to get to the post game stats, I was not able to report him.

EITHER FIX THIS OR LET US REPORT PLAYERS AFTER A GAME BECAUSE TOO MANY TIMES HAS THIS HAPPENED TO ME :(((((((

I play on a Mac btw.

replies.body:
If you are getting disconnected from chat and the End of Game stats screen never appears, it looks like you might be consistently losing your connection to PvP.net (the client).  If you don't maintain a stable and consistent connection, it won't know to pull up the end of game stats screen, or you may get random DC's.  In order to fix this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#section-mac).  It has the most common solutions that should get this stable and allow you to report players if you need to.

Let me know if this doesn't help!

Hey there dArtagnan! Thanks for taking your time to try help me out!

I have read over the Connection Issues Guide. I tried to figure out what it was that was causing me to disconnect from PvP.net but I still can't seem to find out what's going on.  I noticed that even when I'm ingame and having no lag issues, when I alt + tab out and check the client it just says either that I have been disconnected from chat or the other message (I forget what exactly it is). Sometimes after the game the end game stats still show up but before that it shows that I've been disconnected. I'm still really confused what's going on, so sorry!
